svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Total tax revenue (% of GDP) vs. GDP per capita (PPP, constant 2011 international dollars). Each dot on the plot is
a different country, and world regions are color-coded.
Total tax revenue as share of GDP
